properties.areaDesc: Laurens, GA; Washington, GA; Wilkinson, GA; Johnson, GA
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 18 at 3:06AM EST until January 20 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Georgia...

Oconee River near Dublin affecting Johnson...Laurens...Washington
and Wilkinson Counties


.Recent heavy rainfall has caused significant runoff into streams and
rivers which will cause flooding in some areas.

The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a
* Flood Warning for
The Oconee River near Dublin.
* From early this morning until late Sunday night.
* At 3AM Saturday the stage was 20.8 feet...and
rising.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 21 feet.
* The river will continue rising to just over 21 feet. The river will fall below
flood Sunday.
* At 21 feet...Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding begins in the
woodlands and natural flood plain along the river upstream and
downstream from the gage on U.S. Highway 80.
properties.instruction:
All persons with interests along the river should monitor the latest
forecasts...and be prepared to take necessary precautions to protect
life and property.

The latest stage data was furnished in cooperation with the United
States Geological Survey.
